group_1.textCenter: Arrrgh! I can't take it anymore!@I gotta get out of this funk!
C'mon Rika!@Just forget about it already!
I know who I should call…
Hey, Emirin?@Let's go out with some boys!
Like, tomorrow soon!@Yeah! Okay how about[chara:303101:lipSynch_0]—

group_1.textLeft: Oh my God,@don't be so nervous!
Your right hand is moving in time with@your right leg. You're like a total robot!
I've never seen anybody march to a mixer@before! Haha!

group_1.textRight: Hnnng, shut up!
I've never even been to one of these things!@Gimme a break!

group_1.textLeft: Just relax, girl! It'll be fine!
No need to worry.
I know the boys coming today.@Who wouldn't want a little cutie like you?

group_1.textRight: Watch it, you.
I can't believe you're even taking me@out to a mixer in the first place...
Which, for the record,@I haven't asked you to do...

group_1.textLeft: Well, like they totally say, the best way@to get over a lost love is to find a new one!
So let's go find your new prince already!@Kay?

group_1.textRight: New prince... Right.
That says it all right there.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@What's that mean?

group_1.textRight: We are two totally different types@of girls...
I feel like I'm crashing the cool@kids' party...
And it's my first mixer ever!@This is just way too much.

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, that's what you're worried about?
I've totally got your back, girl! I told you@there's another girl coming, right?
She's like, super sweet and innocent!

group_1.textRight: Oh no!@Really?!

group_1.textLeft: Heck yeah!@She's like, the perfect little girl.
So we're all pretty different.@Does that make you feel better?

group_1.textRight: Eh...kinda?
(Sounds like I'm not the only odd one out,@at least.)

group_1.textLeft: Oooh! There she is!@Rikkiii!

group_1.textRight: (Okay, sweet and innocent girl...@Sweet and...)
Hrm... Huh?
Do you have, like, hawk eyes or@something? I don't see her.
Are you kidding me?!@She's our third?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes she iiis!
Her name's Rika Ayano.@I call her Rikki!

group_1.textRight: Rikki...right. Heh...heh...

group_1.textLeft: Got any eyeliner on you, Emirin?
I had gym today, so my makeup is a mess.

group_1.textRight: Yeah I've got some.

group_1.textLeft: Really?!@Can I use some?

group_1.textRight: Totes!@[chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Let's do it up once we get inside!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, girl!@[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100]You're a lifesaver.
Oh hey, nice to meet you!@I'm Rika Ayano.

group_1.textRight: Errrm!
Haha, yeah...@Nice to meet you.
(Emiri...)
(What part of this girl is "sweet@and innocent"?!)
(Look up these words in a dictionary before@you use them!)
